text: The Autopista A3, also known as Autopista Havana-Melena,Autopista Habana- Melena on cu.geoview.info is a Cuban motorway linking Havana to Melena del Sur.Source: Mapa de Carreteras de Cuba (Road map of Cuba). Ediciones GEO, Havana 2011 - It is a toll-free road and has a length of . ==Route== The A3 is a dual carriageway with 4 lanes and has some at-grade intersections with rural roads. It starts in Havana, from an interchange of the Havana Beltway (A2), and continues through Mayabeque Province; crossing the western side of the municipality of San José de las Lajas, and ending on a provincial highway, 2 km west of Melena del Sur. {| class="wikitable" |- align="center" bgcolor="08842C" style="color: white;font-size:100%;" | colspan="6" | AUTOPISTA A3 (La Habana–Melena) |- !Exit!!align="center"|↓km↓!!align="center"|Province!!align="center"|Note |- | File:AB-Kreuz-grün.svg 20px Primer Anillo (Havana Beltway) ||align="right"|0.0 || align="center"|Havana|| |- | File:AB-AS-grün.svg Habana Las Guásimas ||align="right"|5.8 || align="center"|Havana|| |- | File:AB-AS-grün.svg Habana Managua ||align="right"|10.2 || align="center"|Havana|| |- | File:AB-AS-grün.svg Nazareno ||align="right"|16.8 || align="center"|Mayabeque|| |- | File:AB-AS-grün.svg San Antonio de las Vegas ||align="right"|20.0 || align="center"|Mayabeque|| |- | File:AB-AS-grün.svg La Ruda-San Antonio de las Vegas||align="right"|26.0 || align="center"|Mayabeque|| |- | File:AB-AS-grün.svg Guara- Marañón||align="right"|27.7 || align="center"|Mayabeque|| |- | File:AB-AS- grün.svg Melena del Sur||align="right"|32.5 || align="center"|Mayabeque|| |} ==See also== *Roads in Cuba *Transport in Cuba *Infrastructure of Cuba ==References== ==External links== A3 Category:Transport in Havana Category:Mayabeque Province
